did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Register contains information about interments including name, place of birth, last residence, date of death, age in years, months, and days, cause of death, plot number, grave number, and remarks.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Register contain information about interments including name, place of birth, last residence, date of death, age in years, months, and days, cause of death, plot number, grave number, and remarks. Entries arranged in order of interment.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Grove Cemetery of Trumansburg Register. #6180. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
